bwwExcerpt: No matter how one feels about Stephen Schwartz's sappy 1972 hit, this production pumps up the facile material with nonstop, fearless brainstorms. These are by Paulus (who braved more sacred icons when she took on 'Hair' and 'The Gershwins' Porgy & Bess') and 'circus creator' Gypsy Snider, founder of Canada's circus troupe Les 7 doigts de la main.
